title: "Cal State San Marcos Receives Grant to Create Speech Therapy Video Games"
excerpt: "Cal State San Marcos is the co-recipient of a grant from the National Science Foundation through which it will work with an industry partner on games that could improve outcomes for children in speech therapy."
